function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Little attention to implementing technology in the built environment","Impact":"Limited range of applications and potential for increased risk of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Increase research and investment in technology integration, and raise awareness of its importance","Technologies":"Integration of air purification and filtration technologies, advanced ventilation systems","People":"Residents, building occupants","Owner":"Government, building developers, and architects"},{"Description":"Insufficient research on the efficiency of air purification systems","Impact":"Increased risk of air pollutants, relative humidity issues, and inadequate CO2 control","Mitigation":"Conduct further research on air purification system efficiency and effects on indoor air quality","Technologies":"Advanced air purification systems, sensors for air quality monitoring","People":"Researchers, environmental experts","Owner":"Research institutions, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate understanding of ventilation-related interventions","Impact":"Increased risk of infections and adverse health effects on humans","Mitigation":"Conduct more studies into ventilation technologies and their impact on indoor air quality","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, air exchange units","People":"Architects, building engineers","Owner":"Engineering firms, architectural design firms"}]}
